contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of June 2005, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated March 24, 2005, the Petition for Reinstatement is GRANTED.
Pursuant to Rule 218(e), Pa.R.D.E., petitioner is directed to pay the expenses incurred by the Board in the investigation and processing of the Petition for Reinstatement.
